text: avarkalutaiya napi avarkalitam"niccayamaka allah taluttai unkalukku aracanaka anuppiyirukkiran" enru kurinar; (atarku) avarkal, "enkal mitu avar eppati atikaram celutta mutiyum? Atikaram celutta avarai vita nankal tam takutiyutaiyavarkal; melum, avarukkut tiranta celvamum kotukkapatavillaiye!" Enru kurinarkal; atarkavar, "niccayamaka allah unkalaivita (melaka) avaraiye terntetuttirukkinran; innum, arivarralilum, utal valimaiyilum avarukku atikamaka valankiyullan - allah tan natiyorukkut tan (araca) atikarattai valankukiran; innum allah vicalamana (kotaiyutaiya)van; (yavarraiyum) nankaripavan" enru kurinar
